What does ngxtension offer? üöÄ

Signal Utilities

connectConnect everything to everythingderivedFromcombineLatest with signals supportexplicitEffecteffect with explicit dependenciescreateNotifierthe tick you‚Äôre missingsignalSlicetasty sliced state managementtoLazySignaldefer signal‚Äôs eager executiontoObservableSignalconvert observable to signalmergeFrommerge multiple signalscomputedPreviousaccess previous signal value

Router Utilities

linkedQueryParambidirectional query parameter bindinginjectQueryParamsinject signal route query paramsinjectParamsinject signal route paramsinjectRouteDatainject data from the current routeinjectRouteFragmentinject route fragment as signalinjectNavigationEndlisten to navigation end events

Injector Utilities

injectLazyLazy inject your lazy servicescreateInjectionTokencool InjectionToken creationinjectDestroydestroy$ you don‚Äôt have to unsubinjectNetworktrack the current network stateinjectIsIntersectinglisten when element intersectsinjectLocalStorageinject localStorage as signalinjectTextSelectioninject text selection as signalinjectInputsinject component inputs as signalscreateInjectablecreate injectable services easilyautoEffectautomatic effect management

RxJS Operators

debuglog stream inputs and transformed outputsfilterArrayfilter array emitted by the streamfilterNilfilter out null and undefined valuesmapArraymap array emitted by the streammapSkipUndefinedskip undefined on mappollpoll a stream every ‚Äúperiod‚Äù millisecondsreduceArrayreduce array emitted by the streamwhenDocumentVisibleemit only when document is visiblederiveLoadingderive loading state from streamstakeLatestFromtake latest value from multiple streams

Forms

ifValidator / ifAsyncValidator

apply sync/async conditional form validation

controlValueAccessorcreate custom form controlscontrolErrorhandle form control errorsformEventsenhanced form event handling

Pipes

repeatPiperepeat pipe for template iterationcall/applycall and apply functions in templates

Effects & Lifecycle

createEffect

standalone version of NgRx ComponentStore Effect

effectOnceIfrun effect once when condition is metrxEffectutility to create a side effect with rxjs

Directives

clickOutsidetrack when clicked outside an elementrepeatextension for an effective NgFor iterationresizetrack element/host resizingTrackById / TrackByProp

Components

collection of Gestures to bind mouse and touch events
